description: The structure of the "mod.json" file that D2RMM mods should provide.

$schema.description: The JSON schema used to validate the file.

description.description: A short description of the mod.

website.description: The website of the mod. Ideally, this should link to the Nexus Mods page for the mod.

config.description:
The configuration for the mod. This allows the mod to set up a custom configuration UI
that the user can interact with to customize the behavior of the mod.

ModConfigFieldOrSection.description: A single configuration field or section.

ModConfigSection.description: A section in the configuration UI that can contain other fields or sections.

type.description: The type of the configuration element.

description.description: The description for the section that appears in a help tooltip.

visible.description: Determines if the section is visible or not.

defaultExpanded.description: Whether the section should be expanded by default.

allowToggleAll.description:
Whether the "toggle all" button can appear in this section.
Note that this button will only appear if all the children
of this section are checkboxes.

children.description: The fields or sections that are contained within this section.

defaultValue.description:
If this value is anything other than `null`, the section will have a
checkbox on the left hand side that will set this section's `value`
the same way as it would work for a checkbox field.

overrideValue.description:
The override value of the section field.
If this value is anything other than `null`, it will override the current value.
If the value is overridden, it will also be read only.
This needs to be used in unison with `defaultValue`.

id.description: The unique identifier of the configuration element.

Binding.description: A binding that can be dynamically evaluated to a value.

Checks if the first parameter (`T`) is not equal to the second parameter (`T`).
Checks if the first parameter (`number`) is less than the second parameter (`number`).
Checks if the first parameter (`number`) is less than or equal to the second parameter (`number`).
Checks if the first parameter (`number`) is greater than the second parameter (`number`).
CHecks if the first parameter (`number`) is greater than or equal to the second parameter (`number`).
Checks if the first parameter (`string` or `number`) is a part of the second parameter (`string[]` or `number[]`).

If the first parameter (`boolean`) is true, returns the second parameter (`T`), otherwise returns the third parameter (`T`).

ModConfigFieldCheckbox.description:
Represents a boolean (true/false) configuration field that will be represented
as a checkbox or toggle element in the configuration UI.

type.description: The type of the configuration element.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the checkbox field.

overrideValue.description:
The override value of the checkbox field.
If this value is anything other than `null`, it will override the current value.
If the value is overridden, it will also be read only.

description.description: The description for the field that appears in a help tooltip.

visible.description: Determines if the field is visible or not.

id.description: The unique identifier of the configuration element.

ModConfigFieldNumber.description:
Represents a number configuration field that will be represented as a number
input in the configuration UI.

type.description: The type of the configuration element.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the number field.

minValue.description: The minimum value that the user can input.

maxValue.description: The maximum value that the user can input.

overrideValue.description:
The override value of the number field.
If this value is anything other than `null`, it will override the current value.
If the value is overridden, it will also be read only.

description.description: The description for the field that appears in a help tooltip.

visible.description: Determines if the field is visible or not.

id.description: The unique identifier of the configuration element.

Binding_2.description: A binding that can be dynamically evaluated to a value.

anyOf.description: Returns the value of the configuration field whose id matches the first parameter (`string`).
If the first parameter (`boolean`) is true, returns the second parameter (`T`), otherwise returns the third parameter (`T`).
Returns the value of the configuration field whose id matches the first parameter (`string`).
If the first parameter (`boolean`) is true, returns the second parameter (`T`), otherwise returns the third parameter (`T`).

ModConfigFieldText.description:
Represents a text configuration field that will be represented as a text input
in the configuration UI.

type.description: The type of the configuration element.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the text field.

overrideValue.description:
The override value of the text field.
If this value is anything other than `null`, it will override the current value.
If the value is overridden, it will also be read only.

description.description: The description for the field that appears in a help tooltip.

visible.description: Determines if the field is visible or not.

id.description: The unique identifier of the configuration element.

Binding_3.description: A binding that can be dynamically evaluated to a value.

anyOf.description: Returns the value of the configuration field whose id matches the first parameter (`string`).
If the first parameter (`boolean`) is true, returns the second parameter (`T`), otherwise returns the third parameter (`T`).
Returns the value of the configuration field whose id matches the first parameter (`string`).
If the first parameter (`boolean`) is true, returns the second parameter (`T`), otherwise returns the third parameter (`T`).

ModConfigFieldSelect.description:
Represents a select configuration field that will be represented as a dropdown
select element in the configuration UI.

type.description: The type of the configuration element.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the select field.

overrideValue.description:
The override value of the select field.
If this value is anything other than `null`, it will override the current value.
If the value is overridden, it will also be read only.

options.description: The options that the user can select from.

description.description: The description of the option that appears underneath the label in the dropdown.

label.description: The label of the option that will be displayed in the dropdown.

value.description: The value of the option that will be used when the user selects it.

description.description: The description for the field that appears in a help tooltip.

visible.description: Determines if the field is visible or not.

id.description: The unique identifier of the configuration element.

ModConfigSingleValue.description: Represents the valid value of any single configuration field.

Binding_4.description: A binding that can be dynamically evaluated to a value.

ModConfigFieldColor.description:
Represents a color configuration field that will be represented as a color picker
element in the configuration UI.

type.description: The type of the configuration element.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the color in RGBA format (`[0, 255]`, `[0, 255]`, `[0, 255]`, `[0.0, 1.0]`).

overrideValue.description:
The override value of the color field.
If this value is anything other than `null`, it will override the current value.
If the value is overridden, it will also be read only.

isAlphaHidden.description: Whether the alpha channel should be hidden in the color picker.

description.description: The description for the field that appears in a help tooltip.

visible.description: Determines if the field is visible or not.

id.description: The unique identifier of the configuration element.

Binding_5.description: A binding that can be dynamically evaluated to a value.

If the first parameter (`boolean`) is true, returns the second parameter (`T`), otherwise returns the third parameter (`T`).
